posts.name: Yoni karpovsky
posts.cooked: go watch our 6 ball autonomous run!
Just wow. Are you concerned at all about hitting alliance partners during taxi, or are you just planning to ask them all for a delay?

posts.name: James Oosterhouse
posts.cooked: @gellnick I think they’re even better than 1690

posts.name: Ethan Braun
posts.cooked: That is actually a really smart way of doing that, I wonder if there will be any issues with it though in actual comp.

posts.name: Michael Cameron
posts.cooked: It’s just amazing what students can accomplish if they don’t give up.

posts.name: Bri
posts.cooked: This is genuinely my favorite auto. Now we need to rework our entire auto routine to do this. 5 ball auto? What were we thinking.

posts.name: Bryce Hanson
posts.cooked: We toyed with this path at the outset of the season, but eventually decided it was too risky. Props to 5987!

suggested_topics.excerpt: Look at the VOD from the Northern Lights Twitch stream on Saturday around 6:45 into the stream. These VODs evaporate after a while, so don’t wait too long to grab the clip you want.
